code: if (FALSE) { # load fruits data: load(system.file("app/exampleModels/", "fruitsExample.Rdata", package = "ReSources")) # get Fruits-Object fruitsObj <- fruits(data, modelOptions, valueNames, priors, userEstimates) # run model model <- compileRunModel(fruitsObj) modelResults <- getResultStatistics(model$parameters, model$userEstimateSamples, fruitsObj,   DT = FALSE, agg = FALSE )  # better: use shiny app: shiny::runApp(paste0(system.file(package = "ReSources"), "/app")) }
